summary: The diff implements chunked video upload with blob storage and public upload access with admin-only deletion. Most requirements are covered, but migration of existing URL-based titles (REQ-10 AC) and retry capability for failed chunks (REQ-11 AC) are not evident in the diff. Additionally, estimated time remaining (REQ-11 AC) is not displayed in the progress component.

missing_requirements.requirement: Existing URL-based titles are migrated or marked for re-upload
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows removal of URL field from the data model and replacement with blob storage, but provides no evidence of migration logic for existing URL-based titles. The backend changes show the new blob-based Title type, but no migration code or re-upload marking mechanism is visible.

missing_requirements.requirement: Upload progress shows estimated time remaining
missing_requirements.reason: The UploadProgress component displays upload percentage and file size information, but does not show estimated time remaining for the upload as specified in the acceptance criteria.

missing_requirements.requirement: Error handling for failed chunks with retry capability
missing_requirements.reason: The AdminUploadPage handles video file upload and displays progress, but there is no visible implementation of retry logic for failed chunks. The ExternalBlob upload mechanism is used, but chunk-level error handling and retry capability are not evident in the diff.
